$crew chief Mike Everitt missed the game due to being caught in a police pursuit and shootout; his rental car was hit by an allegedly stolen vehicle and he had to take cover on the floor of the car while the police officers and suspects exchanged gunfire; Everitt was unhurt; minor league call-up umpire Chris Segal, who was in Gwinnett County to work an International League game, drove to the park to work this game instead
